introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Family Garden is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of April 27, 2016 and the French Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978, as amended.

dataCollected.title: 2. Data collected
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of data:

items.profileDesc: profile photo, biography, date of birth
items.userContentDesc: time capsules, photos, videos, texts, family trees
items.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, connection data, access logs
items.paymentDesc: processed exclusively by our provider Stripe (we never store your banking data)

dataUsage.title: 3. Data usage
items: Provide and improve our time capsule services
Manage your account and subscriptions
Process your payments securely
Send you notifications about your capsules and their scheduled opening
Ensure the security and availability of the platform
Respond to your support requests

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal basis for processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.contractDesc: to provide our time capsule services
legalBasis.consentDesc: for marketing communications and analytical cookies
legalBasis.legitimateInterestDesc: to improve our services and ensure security

retention.title: 5. Data retention
retention.content: Your data is retained for the duration of your active account. If you delete your account, your personal data will be deleted within 30 days, except for legal retention obligations (billing data: 10 years).
retention.capsules: Time capsules are retained according to the settings you have defined, including digital legacy capsules that can be transmitted to your designated guardians.

location.title: Data location
location.content: Your personal data is stored on servers located in the European Union (AWS regions eu-west-1 Ireland and eu-central-1 Frankfurt), ensuring GDPR-compliant protection without transfer to third countries.

encryption.title: Encryption and protection
encryption.replicationDesc: Data replicated within the EU region for high availability

rights.title: 7. Your rights
rights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR (Articles 15 to 22), you have the following rights:
rights.accessDesc: obtain a copy of your personal data
rights.erasureDesc: request the deletion of your data
rights.restrictionDesc: restrict the processing of your data
rights.portabilityDesc: receive your data in a structured format
rights.objectionDesc: object to the processing of your data
rights.withdrawalDesc: withdraw your consent at any time
rights.exerciseRights: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
rights.responseTime: We will respond to your request within one month in accordance with the GDPR.

technical.title: Technical measures
items: AES-256 encryption for all data at rest
TLS 1.2+ protocol for all network communications
Two-factor authentication (2FA) available
Role-based access control (Row Level Security - RLS)
Continuous access monitoring and anomaly detection
Regular penetration testing by independent experts
Web Application Firewall (WAF) and DDoS protection

organizational.title: Organizational measures
items: Restricted data access based on the principle of least privilege
Regular staff training on data protection
Documented security incident management procedures
Annual security audits
Vulnerability management policy

transfers.title: 9. International data transfers
transfers.intro: Your data is primarily stored in the European Union. However, some of our subprocessors are located in the United States. These transfers are governed by appropriate safeguards:

guarantees.title: Legal guarantees
guarantees.scc: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission (Implementing Decision 2021/914 of June 4, 2021)
guarantees.dpf: Data Privacy Framework (DPF) for certified US companies (Adequacy Decision of July 10, 2023)
guarantees.additional: Additional measures: end-to-end encryption, pseudonymization, transfer impact assessment

transfers.copyRequest: You can request a copy of the appropriate safeguards by contacting us at

cookies.title: 10. Cookies
cookies.intro: We use essential cookies for site operation and analytical cookies (with your consent) to improve our services.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Google Analytics with IP anonymization (duration: 13 months maximum)

authority.title: Supervisory authority
authority.intro: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL:
authority.name: CNIL - French Data Protection Authority
authority.address: 3 Place de Fontenoy, TSA 80715, 75334 Paris Cedex 07, France

presentation.title: 1. Service presentation
presentation.content: Family Garden is a family memory preservation platform that allows users to create, store and share digital memory capsules. These capsules can contain texts, photos, videos, audio recordings and other multimedia content intended to be preserved and transmitted to future generations.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: Using Family Garden implies full and complete acceptance of these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Modifications will take effect upon publication on the site.

registration.title: 3. Registration and user account
registration.intro: To access Family Garden features, you must create a user account by providing accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
items: The confidentiality of your login credentials
All activities carried out under your account
Updating your personal information
Immediate notification in case of unauthorized use of your account
registration.ageRequirement: You must be at least 16 years old to create an account. Minors under 16 must obtain parental consent.

usage.title: 4. Use of the service
usage.intro: You agree to use Family Garden responsibly and legally. It is prohibited to:
items: Publish illegal, defamatory, obscene content or content that infringes the rights of others
Impersonate another person
Attempt to access other users' accounts
Use the service for unauthorized commercial purposes
Transmit viruses or malicious code
Disrupt the normal operation of the platform
Collect personal data from other users without their consent

userContent.title: 5. User content
userContent.intro: You retain all intellectual property rights to the content you post on Family Garden. By uploading content, you grant us a non-exclusive license to:
items: Store, display and transmit your content according to your sharing settings
Create backup copies for data preservation
Technically adapt your content for different devices (resizing, compression)
userContent.guarantee: You warrant that you have the necessary rights to all content you post and that it does not violate the rights of third parties.

capsules.title: 6. Memory capsules and Legacy feature
capsules.intro: Family Garden offers a unique feature for transmitting capsules after the user's death. This feature involves:
items: Designating trusted guardians who can unlock your capsules
Defining unlock conditions (date, event, death)
Responsibility for keeping your guardians' information up to date
capsules.disclaimer: Family Garden cannot guarantee transmission in case of service discontinuation. We recommend keeping copies of your most important content.

circles.title: 7. Sharing circles
circles.content: Circles allow you to share your capsules with trusted groups of people. You are responsible for managing your circles and the people you invite. Circle members can view shared capsules according to the permissions you define.

storage.title: 8. Storage and retention
storage.intro: Family Garden is committed to preserving your content with the greatest care. However:
items: Storage space is limited according to your subscription type
We perform regular backups but do not guarantee 100% recovery in case of major disaster
Inactive free accounts for more than 2 years may be deleted after notification

ip.title: 9. Intellectual property
ip.content: The Family Garden platform, including its design, logo, features and source code, is protected by intellectual property rights. Any unauthorized reproduction, modification or use is strictly prohibited.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of liability
liability.intro: Family Garden is provided "as is". We cannot be held responsible for:
items: Temporary service interruptions for maintenance
Data loss caused by exceptional circumstances
Your use of the service
Content posted by other users
Indirect damages related to the use of the service

termination.title: 11. Suspension and termination
termination.intro: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of:
items: Violation of these Terms
Fraudulent or illegal activity
Non-payment of subscriptions (for premium accounts)
Request from competent authorities
termination.deletion: You can delete your account at any time from your personal space. Deletion results in permanent erasure of your data after a 30-day period.

dataProtection.title: 12. Personal data protection
dataProtection.content: The processing of your personal data is detailed in our
dataProtection.commitment: . We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and protecting your personal information.

modifications.title: 13. Service modifications
modifications.content: Family Garden may modify, suspend or discontinue all or part of the service, temporarily or permanently. We will endeavor to notify you within a reasonable time in case of major changes.

law.title: 14. Applicable law and jurisdiction
law.content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution will be submitted to the competent French courts, after an attempt at amicable resolution.

contact.title: 15. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Use, you can contact us at:

cookies.content: This site uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. Essential cookies are necessary for site operation. Analytical cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the site.

pricing.title: 3. Pricing and payment
pricing.content: Prices are indicated in euros including tax. Payment is made by credit card via our secure provider Stripe. Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually according to the chosen option.
pricing.modification: Prices may be changed at any time. In case of modification, the new price will apply to the next billing period, after 30 days prior notice.

duration.title: 4. Duration and renewal
duration.content: The subscription is taken out for a period of one month or one year according to the chosen option. It is automatically renewed at each due date, unless cancelled by the user before the renewal date.

withdrawal.title: 5. Right of withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the French Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal does not apply to contracts for the supply of digital content not provided on a tangible medium whose execution has begun with the consumer's agreement.
withdrawal.guarantee: However, we offer a 14-day "satisfaction guaranteed" refund for any new Premium or Heritage subscription.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: The user can cancel their subscription at any time from their personal space or via the subscription management portal. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
termination.access: In case of cancellation, the user retains access to paid features until the end of the already paid period.

liability.title: 7. Liability
liability.content: Family Garden is committed to providing services with diligence. We cannot be held liable for service interruptions beyond our control, nor for indirect damages related to the use of our services.

dataProtection.title: 8. Data protection
dataProtection.content: The processing of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, accessible from our site. We are committed to protecting your data in accordance with the GDPR.

purpose.title: 1. Purpose
purpose.content: These Terms of Sale govern the sales of services offered by Family Garden SAS to its users via the familygarden.fr platform. Any subscription to a paid plan implies unreserved acceptance of these Terms of Sale.

services.title: 2. Services offered
services.intro: Family Garden offers the following subscriptions:

free.name: Free
free.description: Limited access with basic storage (500 MB), text and photo capsule creation, 1 sharing circle.

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Extended storage (10 GB), video and audio capsules, up to 5 sharing circles, scheduled capsules, PDF export.

legacy.name: Heritage
legacy.description: All Premium features + unlimited family tree, digital legacy capsules, trusted guardians, unlimited circles, 50 GB storage.

pricing.title: 3. Pricing and payment
pricing.content: Subscription prices are displayed in euros including VAT on the pricing page. Payment is made by credit card via our secure provider Stripe. Billing is monthly or annual depending on the chosen option.
pricing.modifications: Family Garden reserves the right to modify its prices at any time. New prices will apply to new subscriptions and renewals after 30 days prior notice.

duration.title: 4. Duration and renewal
duration.content: Subscriptions are concluded for a monthly or annual period depending on the chosen option. They are automatically renewed at expiry unless cancelled by the user before the renewal date via their personal space or the Stripe customer portal.

withdrawal.title: 5. Right of withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the French Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal does not apply to services fully performed before the end of the withdrawal period and whose execution began after the consumer's express prior agreement.
withdrawal.guarantee: However, Family Garden offers a 14-day money-back guarantee for any new Premium or Heritage subscription. To benefit from it, contact us at contact@familygarden.fr.

cancellation.title: 6. Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your personal space. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current period, without pro-rata refund.
cancellation.access: After cancellation, your account will automatically switch to the free plan. Your data exceeding free plan limits will remain accessible in read-only mode for 30 days.

liability.title: 7. Liability
liability.content: Family Garden undertakes to provide its services diligently. However, its liability cannot be engaged in case of force majeure, third party action, or user fault. Family Garden's liability is limited to the amounts actually paid by the user during the last 12 months.

dataProtection.title: 8. Data protection
dataProtection.content: The processing of personal data within the scope of subscriptions is governed by our Privacy Policy accessible on our website. Payment data is processed exclusively by Stripe and is never stored on our servers.

modifications.title: 9. Modification of Terms
modifications.content: Family Garden reserves the right to modify these Terms of Sale. Users will be informed by email of any substantial modification at least 30 days before it comes into effect. Continued use of the service after this date constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

jurisdiction.title: 10. Applicable law and disputes
jurisdiction.content: These Terms of Sale are governed by French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought first. Failing that, French courts will have jurisdiction. In accordance with the Consumer Code, you may use the MEDICYS mediation service free of charge (www.medicys.fr).
